hero.title: Window Solutions per Room
hero.subtitle: Create the perfect atmosphere in every room. From blackout for the bedroom to ambient light in the living room.

collections.title: Our Collections
collections.description: Choose between our pleated screens for insect protection or pleated curtains for sun protection and privacy.

horren.title: Pleated Screens
horren.description: Keep insects out with style. Our pleated screens are space-saving, elegant and custom-made for doors, windows, and balconies.

gordijnen.title: Pleated Curtains
gordijnen.description: Privacy and style in every fold. Choose from blackout, light-filtering or insulating honeycomb. Custom-made for your exact dimensions.

rooms.title: Discover by Room
rooms.description: Select a room to see the best combinations of window decoration and screens.

combinations.title: Popular Combinations
combinations.subtitle: Frequently chosen solutions by our customers.

calculator.title: No hidden costs.
calculator.description: Enter your dimensions and receive an honest price indication immediately. No surprises, everything included including installation service.

form.title: Calculate Price Directly
form.disclaimer: No obligation â€¢ Response within 24 hours

measurement.title: Measuring is knowing
measurement.description: No worries about measurements. With our simple measuring instructions, anyone can provide the right dimensions. We guide you step by step.
measurement.alert: Always measure in <bold>cm</bold> and in 3 places for certainty.

steps.video_desc: A video for every window type.
steps.insurance_desc: Measured wrong? We replace the product for free.

review1.text: The configurator works super simply. Exactly what I needed for my new apartment in Utrecht.
review1.name: Jan de Vries

review2.text: Great quality screens. Fast delivery and everything fits perfectly thanks to the measuring instructions.
review2.name: Sophie Jansen

review3.text: Beautiful blinds for a fair price. Customer service was very helpful with a question about installation.
review3.name: Mark Bakker

risk_free.title: No Risk, Certainty
risk_free.desc: All our products come with a 5-year warranty. Carefree use.

returns.title: Free Returns
returns.desc: Standard sizes can be returned free of charge within 30 days.

columns.company_desc: For over 10 years the specialist in pleated screens and curtains for Dutch homes. Craftsmanship, quality and personal service.

ProductConfigurator.ar_modal_desc: Scan the QR code with your smartphone to view this product in augmented reality in your own space.
ProductConfigurator.ar_modal_link: Or open this link on your mobile device

plisse_hordeur.name: Pleated Door Screen - Custom Made
plisse_hordeur.description: Space-saving pleated door screen for balconies, terraces and garden doors. Easy to operate with one hand.

execution.label: Execution
execution.infoContent: Choose between a single or double execution. A double execution opens to two sides and is ideal for wider openings.

profile.label: Profile Width
profile.infoContent: The 3.5cm profile is suitable for most standard situations. Choose the 4cm profile for larger openings or when extra sturdiness is desired.

mesh.label: Mesh Type
mesh.infoContent: Standard polyester mesh is suitable for most situations. Pet-Screen is extra strong and pet-resistant. Poll-Tex also filters pollen for hay fever sufferers.

threshold.label: Threshold Option
threshold.infoContent: Choose a threshold-free system when you want no tripping hazard or for accessibility with wheelchair/walker. The magnet system holds the screen in place without a fixed threshold.

color.label: Frame Color
color.infoContent: Choose the color of the aluminum frame. All colors are available in matte finish for a stylish look.

mounting.label: Installation Service
mounting.infoContent: Have your pleated door screen professionally installed by our expert installers. Includes measuring, installation and instruction.

honeycomb_gordijn.name: Honeycomb / Duette Curtain - Custom Made
honeycomb_gordijn.description: The Honeycomb curtain has a unique honeycomb structure that traps air for optimal insulation.

cell_structure.label: Cell Structure
cell_structure.infoContent: Single Cell has one layer of honeycomb and offers good insulation. Double Cell has two layers and offers maximum insulation with up to 25% energy savings.

transparency.label: Transparency
transparency.infoContent: Choose the desired transparency. Transparent lets through a lot of light, semi-transparent filters the light, blackout blocks all light.

operation.label: Operation Type
operation.infoContent: Cord operation is standard and reliable. Smartcord is a cordless solution, safe for children. Electric offers maximum comfort.

execution.label: Execution
execution.infoContent: Standard: curtain moves from top to bottom. Top-down/Bottom-up: curtain can be opened from both top and bottom for more flexibility.

color.label: Color
color.infoContent: Choose from over 100 colors. Order free samples to view the color at home before deciding.

mounting.label: Installation Service
mounting.infoContent: Have your Honeycomb curtain professionally installed by our expert installers. Includes measuring, installation and instruction.

glazen_balkon_hor.name: Glass Balcony Pleated Screen - Custom Made
glazen_balkon_hor.description: Specially designed for glass balcony systems. Minimally visible profiles for maximum view.

height.label: Height
height.infoTitle: Height dimensions of the pleated screen

foundation_beam.label: Foundation Beam
foundation_beam.infoContent: The foundation beam provides a stable base for your pleated screen. Choose a foundation beam when the surface is not level or extra stability is desired.

glass_catch.label: Glass Catch (U-profiles against the upright)
glass_catch.infoContent: The U-profiles are mounted against the uprights and catch the glass. This ensures a neat finish and protects the edges of the glass.

steel_look.label: Steel Look Strips
steel_look.infoContent: Give your pleated screen an industrial look with our Steel Look strips. These black strips are mounted on the frame for a modern sleek design.

draft_strip.label: Draft Strip
draft_strip.infoContent: A draft strip prevents cold air from entering along the edges of the screen. Recommended for optimal insulation.

carrier.label: Carrier
carrier.infoContent: The carrier ensures that multiple panels move simultaneously when you move one panel. Ideal for systems with multiple sliding panels.

handle.label: Door Handle
handle.infoContent: Choose a door handle that fits your interior. From minimalist to classic, we have various options available.

color.label: Frame Color
color.infoContent: Choose the color of the aluminum frame. All colors are available in matte finish for a stylish look.
